name: Responsibility
description:
You're a beautiful princess stumbling upon an egg and a note. It is now your responsibility.

How To:
Move       - W,A,S,D
Shoot      - LMB (Hold)
Feed Apple - Q
Feed Horn  - E

Please mention things that you believe could be better. They are helpful and we really want to hear about the bad parts of the game. That way we make the next ones better! Don't worry, we don't take personally what you say and we don't bite. Well apart from Chumpo he's a biter. 

Made by:
Deniz Cakmaz - Game Design
Chumposaur - Programming
Chris Comb - Sound and Music
Aezylhazel/Mizukichama - Creative Director & Illustrator
